text.text:
*Welcome to Snack N Go!*

Thank you for participating in our research project! Below you can choose to submit a new order or check your account status.

If you've selected to submit a new order, Slack will automatically create a new private channel for that specific order.

*For order submission instructions, please refer to:*
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JOXu2Qwi_I5X__FwH6g0dlyMh-QxqCFeLo3s5l5ImjI/edit?usp=sharing | order submission instructions document>
Send `?` or `help` for getting this block message again.

If you encounter a bug, typo, or other error at any point in the order submission process or other issues, feel free to fill out this <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe7U05qgO7AUrkEcH4brPSnPAsvjgfcE3kEhOrg1b8ZoNPWdA/viewform?usp=sharing | form>!

Feel free to contact BOTH of our team members (so that we can get back to you quicker) via email with any other questions or concerns: Amelia Zhang (az111@wellesley.edu), Victoria Lee (vl111@wellesley.edu)
